description: This restaurant, once referred to as “l’osteria dei cava’i” in reference to the cart drivers and their horses who used to stop here after the First World War, has a history dating back 100 years. Now specialising in fish and shellfish from the Adriatic, Menegaldo has become one of the area’s most popular restaurants.
